label: Books on Africa
description: A selection of new titles on Africa available as e-books from the European Parliament Library.

list.label: Revisiting EU-Africa Relations in a Changing World
Governing Natural Resources for Sustainable Peace in Africa : Environmental Justice and Conflict Resolution
Making the African Continental Free Trade Agreement a Success : Pathways and a Call for Action
Corruption and Economic Growth in Africa : The Impact on Development
Africa and the formation of the new system of international relations. Vol. II, Beyond summit diplomacy: cooperation with Africa in the post-pandemic world
Routledge handbook of contemporary African migration
Developmental regionalism and the political economy of Africa's integration
African Democracy : Impediments, Promises, and Prospects
